title: How EVs are leading the way for safer two-wheelers in India
description: ​​Traditionally, cars have led the way to road safety with standard features like airbags, Anti-lock Braking Systems (ABS) and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems or ADAS. These safety features are pretty much an expectation when it comes to cars. It's different with bikes, though.
